description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. More content, more terrorific experiences! Gather up to 4 adventurers and explore the eerie locations while avoiding the mysterious monster. Will you survive the trip?
description.short: More content, more terrorific experiences! Gather up to 4 adventurers and explore the eerie locations while avoiding the mysterious monster. Will you survive the trip?
